message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our gains.
Alice, my turn. I understand your point about inflation, but that offer wasn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable, this offer benefits us both.
Bob, let's be realistic. The longer this goes on, the less we both get. This offer is a good compromise, even considering the inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both lose the least amount possible.
